channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- Metasys versions prior to 9.0
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- Metasys versions prior to 9.0

item.title: CVE-2019-7593|2024-08-04T20:54:27.934Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20versions%20prior%20to%209.0
item.description: Metasys® ADS/ADX servers and NAE/NIE/NCE engines prior to 9.0 make use of a shared RSA key pair for certain encryption operations involving the Site Management Portal (SMP).

item.title: CVE-2019-7594|2024-08-04T20:54:28.360Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20versions%20prior%20to%209.0
item.description: Metasys® ADS/ADX servers and NAE/NIE/NCE engines prior to 9.0 make use of a hardcoded RC2 key for certain encryption operations involving the Site Management Portal (SMP).
